text: The town is dyed in the sunset...

The other day...
Chiyoko-san mentioned something similar...

Oh, what a coincidence.
Chiyoko came around here too?
Went to the bakery... up the hill...
The bakery up the hill, huh...

If you went up the hill just to buy from there,
they must sell really delicious bread, right?

And then...
After buying the bread... As we left the store...

We were met with...
A beautiful sunset and... a splendid view...

I see.
So you all admired that view together.

After climbing the hill together... the evening scenery we saw...
was truly exceptional...
